oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Adams, Nathan, 1881 March 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Nathan Adams, dated April 8th, 1880. Illustrates the first page of the document about “the matter of Nathan Adams will.” Adams’ will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on March 25th, 1881. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adams family
